-- test: info --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} info
-- expect --
Application:
-- expect --
Name:         test-actuator-app
-- expect --
Description:  Test Spring Boot application with Actuator
-- expect --
Build:
-- expect --
Group:        com.example
-- expect --
Artifact:     test-actuator-app
-- expect --
Version:      1.0.0
